headline: Network Analyst, Tier 3 at U.S. Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE)

defaultPosition.description:
Network Engineer for ICE Network.
Enterprise wide configuration and troubleshooting for L2, L3 switches and routers.
Cisco and Enterasys switch configuration and maintenance.
Remedy ticket managment for ICE NOC operations.
NOC supervisor for all level 3 engineers.
defaultPosition.title: Network Analyst

positions.description:
Network Engineering and Operations Support.
WiFi support for public and private networks.
Firewall management for multiple campuses.
Cisco Nexus configuration and maintenance.
Campus wide L2 and L3 network support.
positions.title: Network Engineer

positions.description: Support Data-Center migration to Greensboro, NC.
positions.title: Network Engineer

positions.description: Systems and Network support for General Dynamics special projects.
positions.title: Network Engineer

positions.description:
Global support for Windows, Solaris/UNIX based systems.
Layer 2 and 3 Cisco Switch and Router configuration and support.
Responsible for network design, installation and maintenance.
Maintain security configurations and protocols.
Support telecommunications specialist.
positions.title: Information Systems Administrator/Network Engineer

positions.description:
Network support for all routers, switches and multiplexors.
Cabling and hardware installation.
Sunset, Tberd, Acterna, Pentascanner, Siecor, Fluke, Fugikura Fusion Splicer, and other wire-scope cable testers including Fiber attenuation meters.
Promina series device ID and node level query and configuration
positions.title: Network Engineer
